※作業の高速化のため表記を省略しています。

２０章　竜の門

離脱ポイントX: Y:

■ワールドマップシーン

■イベント条件群

−ターン条件−
　00 00 00 00 ： ターン条件終わり
−会話条件−
　　　　00 00 00 00 ： 会話条件終わり
−オブジェクト指定−
　　　　00 00 00 00 ： オブジェクト指定終わり
−常時条件＆範囲条件−
　　　　00 00 00 00 ： 常時条件＆範囲条件終わり

−アドレス群−
　C8 B7 D6 08 ： ターン条件へ
　　　　3C BA D6 08 ： 会話条件へ
　　　　90 BA D6 08 ： オブジェクト指定へ
　　　　F4 BA D6 08 ： 常時条件＆範囲条件へ
　　　　52 F4 D6 08 ： アーチの配置(エリウッド編)
　　　　CE F5 D6 08 ： アーチの配置(ヘクトル編)
　　　　34 93 D9 08 ： 敵軍初期配置(エリウッド編ノーマル)
　　　　14 95 D9 08 ： 敵軍初期配置(エリウッド編ハード)
　　　　14 94 D9 08 ： 敵軍初期配置(ヘクトル編ノーマル)
　　　　74 96 D9 08 ： 敵軍初期配置(ヘクトル編ハード)
　　　　84 91 D9 08 ： 自軍初期配置(エリウッド編ノーマル)
　　　　74 92 D9 08 ： 自軍初期配置(エリウッド編ハード)
　　　　84 91 D9 08 ： 自軍初期配置(ヘクトル編ノーマル)
　　　　74 92 D9 08 ： 自軍初期配置(ヘクトル編ハード)
　　　　68 D4 D7 08 ： 開始イベント
　　　　6C D9 D7 08 ： 終了イベント
               
■イベント内容
・クリアイベント
D7C3BC　3C 00 00 00 0D DE 07 08 
　　　　3C 00 00 00 D1 A5 07 08 
　　　　76 00 00 00 
　　　　CC 00 00 00 C8 91 D8 08 
　　　　98 00 00 00 
　　　　8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 
　　　　02 00 0A 00 
　　　　76 00 39 00 
　　　　3C 00 00 00 CD B8 07 08 
　　　　02 00 1E 00 05 00 46 00 3C 00 00 00 DD B2 07 08 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 B8 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 11 00 FF FF 39 00 00 00 7A 00 04 00 8C 00 04 00 90 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 2D B3 07 08 82 00 00 00 2F 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 19 00 00 00 02 00 1E 00 8D 00 04 00 91 00 00 00 02 00 40 00 3B 00 00 00 30 00 00 00 74 81 D9 08 39 00 00 00 30 00 00 00 A4 81 D9 08 39 00 00 00 02 00 40 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 B9 0B 00 00 77 00 56 00 14 00 00 00 09 00 00 00 1E 00 01 00 25 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 0C 00 12 00 0E 00 00 00 26 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 80 C3 D7 08 25 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 0D 00 12 00 0A 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 BA 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 1D 00 0D 09 02 00 60 00 25 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 0C 00 08 00 0E 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 0D 00 0A 00 0E 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 0D 00 0B 00 0A 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 BB 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 1E 00 25 00 25 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 0C 00 07 00 0E 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 7A 00 04 00 02 00 40 00 79 00 39 00 04 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 BC 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 26 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 94 C3 D7 08 26 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 8A C3 D7 08 25 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 0D 00 0D 00 0A 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 BD 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 7A 00 02 00 1D 00 0D 0F 02 00 10 00 E8 00 00 00 A8 C3 D7 08 C0 00 F0 00 7D 00 F6 02 02 00 1C 00 30 00 00 00 E4 81 D9 08 39 00 00 00 E9 00 00 00 02 00 20 00 25 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 0C 00 0E 00 20 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 02 00 20 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 BE 0B 00 00 2D 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 0C 00 05 00 2D 00 00 00 7B 00 00 00 0D 00 09 00 2D 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 0D 00 08 00 2D 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 0D 00 0A 00 2D 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 0C 00 0A 00 09 00 00 00 1D 00 0D 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 BF 0B 00 00 79 00 52 00 04 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 30 00 00 00 24 82 D9 08 39 00 00 00 09 00 00 00 1E 00 24 00 25 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 0C 00 14 00 20 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 69 00 00 00 24 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 C0 0B 00 00 14 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 BD EB 00 08 02 00 00 00 3D 00 00 00 35 CD 07 08 02 00 1E 00 E6 00 00 00 7B 00 00 00 7D 00 EE 02 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 A0 01 02 08 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 00 01 04 10 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 A0 01 02 08 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 00 01 04 10 E7 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 C1 0B 00 00 E6 00 00 00 7A 00 01 00 7D 00 EE 02 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 A0 01 02 08 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 00 01 04 10 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 A0 01 02 08 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 00 01 04 10 E7 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 BD EB 00 08 02 00 00 00 02 00 1E 00 30 00 00 00 44 82 D9 08 39 00 00 00 3D 00 00 00 3D DE 07 08 3C 00 00 00 01 B4 07 08 3D 00 00 00 49 CD 07 08 02 00 1E 00 1D 00 0D 00 65 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 79 00 4A 00 04 00 00 00 D9 00 02 00 90 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 BD EB 00 08 02 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 79 CD 07 08 D6 00 0E 00 D8 00 02 00 91 00 00 00 02 00 40 00 D2 00 00 00 C2 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 D4 00 00 00 C3 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 D1 B3 07 08 30 00 00 00 44 82 D9 08 39 00 00 00 EA 00 00 00 E0 0F 1C 08 00 10 1C 08 04 00 15 01 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 1D 00 0C 03 5D 00 01 00 3D 00 00 00 0D B7 07 08 0D 00 00 00 C4 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 3D 00 00 00 C9 B6 07 08 0D 00 00 00 C5 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 E9 00 00 00 EB 00 00 00 05 00 5C 00 3D 00 00 00 55 BC 07 08 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 3D 00 00 00 69 BC 07 08 02 00 1E 00 0D 00 00 00 C6 0B 00 00 93 00 00 00 40 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 FF 7F 00 00 90 00 00 00 7D 00 E9 02 94 00 00 00 40 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 FF 7F 00 00 91 00 00 00 02 00 10 00 7D 00 EA 02 8E 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 81 BC 07 08 3C 00 00 00 BD EB 00 08 02 00 00 00 D6 00 24 00 76 00 35 00 8F 00 02 00 91 00 00 00 7D 00 F5 02 D2 00 00 00 C7 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 D4 00 00 00 C8 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 D4 00 00 00 C9 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 D4 00 00 00 CA 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 D4 00 00 00 CB 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 D1 B3 07 08 EA 00 00 00 E0 0F 1C 08 00 10 1C 08 04 00 15 01 2D 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 0C 00 06 00 30 00 00 00 64 82 D9 08 3D 00 00 00 D9 BC 07 08 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 02 00 10 00 1D 00 0C 0A 30 00 00 00 04 82 D9 08 39 00 00 00 1D 00 0C 00 76 00 35 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 AD B3 07 08 E9 00 00 00 EB 00 00 00 05 00 5C 00 3D 00 00 00 55 BC 07 08 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 CC 0B 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 81 BC 07 08 3C 00 00 00 D1 B3 07 08 EA 00 00 00 E0 0F 1C 08 00 10 1C 08 04 00 15 01 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 20 00 0C 04 7A 00 01 00 26 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 99 C3 D7 08 26 00 00 00 7B 00 00 00 9E C3 D7 08 25 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 0B 00 0D 00 18 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 DB 00 00 00 0B 00 0C 00 14 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 0D 00 0D 00 2D 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 0C 00 0D 00 0D 00 00 00 CD 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 02 00 1E 00 CD 00 00 00 0D 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 
　　　　40 00 00 00 21 0F 02 08 
　　　　3D 00 00 00 E9 C1 07 08 
　　　　02 00 1E 00 
　　　　0E 00 00 00 CE 0B 00 00 ： エフィデル死
　　　　09 00 00 00 
　　　　02 00 1E 00 
　　　　7D 00 E6 00 
　　　　3D 00 00 00 11 C2 07 08 
　　　　02 00 3C 00 
　　　　3D 00 00 00 0D B7 07 08 
　　　　3C 00 00 00 ED BC 07 08 3C 00 00 00 FD C1 07 08 E9 00 00 00 EB 00 00 00 02 00 3C 00 5D 00 00 80 3C 00 00 00 A1 B7 07 08 02 00 3C 00 1D 00 0C 0D 25 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 0D 00 0C 00 0A 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 0C 00 0C 00 0C 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 CF 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 CD 00 00 00 0B 00 0B 00 01 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 0B 00 0B 00 40 00 00 00 21 0F 02 08 02 00 1E 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 D0 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 7B 00 00 00 0C 00 0B 00 10 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 E6 00 00 00 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 80 01 02 08 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 00 01 04 10 7D 00 D3 00 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 80 01 02 08 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 20 00 00 00 00 01 04 10 E7 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 D1 0B 00 00 09 00 00 00 02 00 08 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 08 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 0B 00 0B 00 02 00 08 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 08 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 0B 00 0B 00 02 00 08 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 08 00 2D 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 0B 00 0B 00 69 00 00 00 44 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 7B 00 00 00 0B 00 0B 00 08 00 00 00 39 00 00 00 25 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 0B 00 0A 00 18 00 00 00 26 00 00 00 DB 00 00 00 A3 C3 D7 08 25 00 00 00 2D 00 00 00 0C 00 0B 00 10 00 00 00 26 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 8F C3 D7 08 39 00 00 00 8C 00 10 00 90 00 00 00 05 00 48 00 8D 00 10 00 91 00 00 00 0D 00 00 00 D2 0B 00 00 79 00 40 00 04 00 00 00 14 00 00 00 3C 00 00 00 BD EB 00 08 02 00 00 00 DD 00 00 00 0F 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 02 00 80 00 E6 00 00 00 E5 00 00 00 FF FF FF FF 04 00 00 00 A0 80 02 0A D2 00 00 00 D3 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 D4 00 00 00 D4 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 8C 00 04 00 90 00 00 00 3D 00 00 00 49 B4 07 08 D8 00 02 00 91 00 00 00 02 00 40 00 D2 00 00 00 D5 0B 00 00 01 00 00 00 02 00 40 00 7A 00 06 00 02 00 80 00 83 00 1A 00 3C 00 00 00 D9 B8 07 08 7F 00 1B 00 02 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

■この章で使われたフラグ
